alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Gwinnett; North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 4:44PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of DeKalb, northern Fayette, Gwinnett, northwestern Henry, southeastern Fulton and Clayton Counties through 515 PM EST... At 444 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near War Hill Park to Sandy Creek, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Lawrenceville, Decatur, Jonesboro, Johns Creek, Dunwoody, East Point, Duluth, Stockbridge, Union City, Sugar Hill, Forest Park, Snellville, Suwanee, Riverdale, College Park, Fairburn, Buford, Lilburn and Chamblee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: DeKalb; Gwinnett; North Fulton; South Fulton
